title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2430.1 - Designation of records access officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2430.1 - Designation of records access officer

State Regulations

The executive director shall be responsible for insuring
compliance with the regulations in this Part and shall designate a records
access officer who shall have the duty of responding to public requests for
access to records of the board and coordinating public access to such
records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2430.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
